entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Broadview
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
